thesaurus.dc:description: A statement about the presence or absence of a taxon at a location. Replaces version issued 2009-10-02, removing all values except 'present' and 'absent'.
thesaurus.dc:title: Occurrence Status GBIF Vocabulary

concept.dc:description: The occurrence was present at the location and time of the observation.
The occurrence was not present at the location and time of the observation.
